title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
Hello, i have 820-01987 no power
USB C consume 19v 0.230 A
Awake and SLPS2R are present
PPBUS_G3H 12.60v
I can't go to DFU mode.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
Be sure to follow all the steps in DFU tutorial.
Machine should enter DFU.
You can try forcing it with SE032 pads.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: Yes, finally it go to DFU mode an i tried revive device but it is not working, i have to restore it ?

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
Did you get error in revive mode?
Restore will erase SSD; probably data lost anyway.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
yes, i know i will lose the data
No error during the revive, but still black screen and nothing on the touch bar, just the charging sound when I connect the charger. what to do now ?

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: Proceed with restore then...

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: It restore without any error but it goes to Apple Controller, but nothing on the screen

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
Check VCORE after 10-15s.
Test external video and USB activity.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: No VCore voltage, no USB activity

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: Check diode mode to ground on all big coils.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: I will try, could be a dead CPU?

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: No short on any big coils.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:

message:

Don't think only short is bad...

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message:
I don't know what you've understood.
Do you believe that only pure short is a problem?
Don't you think that 0.150 reading instead of 0.400 denotes a problem?
I said to compare values; in case you detect big differences.

title: A2289 / 820-01987 no power
message: i did it, i didn't find any different value, all good
